data.text:
The Semiannual Race Meet is held by the school a few times a 
year, to encourage students to challenges themselves and grow. 
It looked like Meisho Doto just got invited to participate, but―
data.processed:
<story>The Semiannual Race Meet is held by the school a few times a 
<story>year, to encourage students to challenges themselves and grow. 
<story>It looked like Meisho Doto just got invited to participate, but―

data.text: Right, then, without further ado, let's schedule our joint rehearsal! Tomorrow, on the turf course, at 1 PM! I'll see you there, Doto! HAAAAH-HAHAHAHA!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: Right, then, without further ado, let's schedule our joint rehearsal! Tomorrow, on the turf course, at 1 PM! I'll see you there, Doto! HAAAAH-HAHAHAHA!

data.text:
........... 
....Oh, I must have passed out from the shock....
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>........... 
<story>....Oh, I must have passed out from the shock....

data.text: Umm, yes, I'm fi... Wait, O- Opeope- Opera O-san picked m-m-m-me!? She wants to compete with me!? Eeehhh?!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Umm, yes, I'm fi... Wait, O- Opeope- Opera O-san picked m-m-m-me!? She wants to compete with me!? Eeehhh?!

data.text:
She seemed completely out of her element when speaking to 
T.M. Opera O. As if, until now, she had only looked up to her from 
afar... If I had to guess――

choices.text: Are you a fan of hers?
Are you a fan of hers?

data.processed:
<story>She seemed completely out of her element when speaking to 
<story>T.M. Opera O. As if, until now, she had only looked up to her from 
<story>afar... If I had to guess――

data.text:
N- no... I could never, I'm not worthy...! 
I'm not a fan, but, um, basically, I- I admire her, I guess...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>N- no... I could never, I'm not worthy...! 
<story>I'm not a fan, but, um, basically, I- I admire her, I guess...

data.text: Umm, umm... So... The... The first time I saw Opera O-san...――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>Umm, umm... So... The... The first time I saw Opera O-san...――

data.text: HAAAHH-HAHAHA! See how the walls and lectern have been decorated! See how the gallery has assembled in this gymnasium! Surely they are here to receive my enrollment!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: HAAAHH-HAHAHA! See how the walls and lectern have been decorated! See how the gallery has assembled in this gymnasium! Surely they are here to receive my enrollment!

data.text:
...Opera O-san stood out so much that day. She was laughing 
so loud when us new students were in line. It really set her 
apart. Then...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>...Opera O-san stood out so much that day. She was laughing 
<story>so loud when us new students were in line. It really set her 
<story>apart. Then...

data.text: Feast your eyes! This is where my Victory Road will――
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: Feast your eyes! This is where my Victory Road will――

data.text: She fell over in a big way.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>She fell over in a big way.

data.text: A- Are you okayyyy....!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>A- Are you okayyyy....!?

data.text:
I got so shaken up...! We'd only just enrolled, and she fell over in 
front of the whole school! If it happened to me, I'd have 
nightmares about it all year! But she――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I got so shaken up...! We'd only just enrolled, and she fell over in 
<story>front of the whole school! If it happened to me, I'd have 
<story>nightmares about it all year! But she――

data.text: Hehe... HAAHH-HAHAHAHA! EXCELLENT! What misfortune could be more impactful than that? Coincidental, but still, magnificent!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: Hehe... HAAHH-HAHAHAHA! EXCELLENT! What misfortune could be more impactful than that? Coincidental, but still, magnificent!

data.text:
(W-wow... She didn't let it get to her at all... 
She's actually even more confident than before... Why...?)
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>(W-wow... She didn't let it get to her at all... 
<story>She's actually even more confident than before... Why...?)

data.text: (I... want to be like her...!)
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>(I... want to be like her...!)

data.text: ...Opera O-san picked me, but it was maybe.... No, probably... No, surely... No, definitely a coincidence...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: ...Opera O-san picked me, but it was maybe.... No, probably... No, surely... No, definitely a coincidence...

data.text: But, if even I can help Opera O-san... I-I'll do my very best...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: But, if even I can help Opera O-san... I-I'll do my very best...!

data.text: The next day. Out of curiosity, I went to observe the two at their "joint rehearsal" (i.e. paired practice). But――
data.processed: The next day. Out of curiosity, I went to observe the two at their "joint rehearsal" (i.e. paired practice). But――

data.text:
HAAAAHAHA! To think she'd be half an hour late for our first 
day!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed:
<story>HAAAAHAHA! To think she'd be half an hour late for our first 
<story>day!

data.text:
The worry crossed my mind that, with the way Meisho Doto was, 
she might have goofed up somewhere. Right at that moment――
data.processed:
<story>The worry crossed my mind that, with the way Meisho Doto was, 
<story>she might have goofed up somewhere. Right at that moment――

data.text: I- I'm sorry～!!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: I- I'm sorry～!!!!

data.text:
So-sorry, I took too long getting ready...! 
I-I'll get to the gate right now! Sorry, so sorry....!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>So-sorry, I took too long getting ready...! 
<story>I-I'll get to the gate right now! Sorry, so sorry....!

data.text:
Just a moment, Doto. 
Do you truly think you're in a worthy state to run?
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed:
<story>Just a moment, Doto. 
<story>Do you truly think you're in a worthy state to run?

data.text: Eek! Y-y-you're right, I'm not...! S-sorry――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>Eek! Y-y-you're right, I'm not...! S-sorry――

data.text: You're wearing slippers, you know.
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: <story>You're wearing slippers, you know.

data.text: She left scrambling to the dorms to get her shoes――
data.processed: <story>She left scrambling to the dorms to get her shoes――

data.text: ...and then night fell.
data.processed: <story>...and then night fell.

data.text: HAAAHAHAHA! She's late!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: <story>HAAAHAHAHA! She's late!

data.text:
Way too late. 
Something must have happened to her, I thought. And right 
then...
data.processed:
<story>Way too late. 
<story>Something must have happened to her, I thought. And right 
<story>then...

data.text: I-I-I-I-I-I'm soooooorrrryyyyy～～!!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: I-I-I-I-I-I'm soooooorrrryyyyy～～!!!!

data.text: I'm sorry I'm sorry, I'm so, SO sorry....!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>I'm sorry I'm sorry, I'm so, SO sorry....!

data.text:
So... I was looking forward to today so much last night, so I 
polished my shoes... And I didn't put them back in the usual 
spot. Then I lost them...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>So... I was looking forward to today so much last night, so I 
<story>polished my shoes... And I didn't put them back in the usual 
<story>spot. Then I lost them...!

data.text: They're not here, not here, not here, not here, not here either! They're not anywheeerrreee!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: They're not here, not here, not here, not here, not here either! They're not anywheeerrreee!?

data.text: And, right when I finally found them――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>And, right when I finally found them――

data.text:
Th-th-th-the racing plate broke...! 
Whyyyy!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Th-th-th-the racing plate broke...! 
<story>Whyyyy!?

data.text: ...W-what if it's because I spent all night hammering it to get it just right, and then all that hammering made the holes get too... I- I'm so stupiiiiiiid!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: ...W-what if it's because I spent all night hammering it to get it just right, and then all that hammering made the holes get too... I- I'm so stupiiiiiiid!

data.text:
A-and then, by the time I bought new shoes, it was already so 
late...! I'm so so sorry for making you wait...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>A-and then, by the time I bought new shoes, it was already so 
<story>late...! I'm so so sorry for making you wait...!

data.text:
Oh! Y-you're right...! I could've done that all along... W-wait, no! 
What's important is that I made trouble for you! I'm sorryyy...!
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: How about we just call it a day?

data.processed:
<story>Oh! Y-you're right...! I could've done that all along... W-wait, no! 
<story>What's important is that I made trouble for you! I'm sorryyy...!

data.text:
It was already late at night. I was about to say that surely it was 
too late, even for T.M. Opera O――
data.processed:
<story>It was already late at night. I was about to say that surely it was 
<story>too late, even for T.M. Opera O――

data.text:
Heh, a little accident like this is no reason for the "Overlord" to 
waver! Can you see? The moon smiles on us tonight, as well! 
So come, let's run!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed:
<story>Heh, a little accident like this is no reason for the "Overlord" to 
<story>waver! Can you see? The moon smiles on us tonight, as well! 
<story>So come, let's run!

data.text: O- Opera O-saaan...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: O- Opera O-saaan...!

data.text:
(A- at the very least, I need to be a good running partner...! 
I need to be the kind of Umamusume that can help her...!)
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>(A- at the very least, I need to be a good running partner...! 
<story>I need to be the kind of Umamusume that can help her...!)

data.text:
Heh, you've got a good look about you, Doto! 
But I'm not going to lose! ――Haaaah!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed:
<story>Heh, you've got a good look about you, Doto! 
<story>But I'm not going to lose! ――Haaaah!

data.text: ...! Y-YAAAAHHH~!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: ...! Y-YAAAAHHH~!!!

data.text: ――Hwuh?!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: ――Hwuh?!

data.text:
...Phew! So, Doto, my good nemesis, how do you like my runni― 
Oh? You fell...?
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed:
<story>...Phew! So, Doto, my good nemesis, how do you like my runni― 
<story>Oh? You fell...?

data.text:
I- I'm sorry~~! I was late, I made you wait, and I can't even give 
you a proper raaaace~!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I- I'm sorry~~! I was late, I made you wait, and I can't even give 
<story>you a proper raaaace~!

data.text:
Wh-what do I do, how do I make it up to you...?! 
Oh, right! Drinks, I brought some drinks...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Wh-what do I do, how do I make it up to you...?! 
<story>Oh, right! Drinks, I brought some drinks...!

data.text:
Though getting everything ready made me even later... 
I'm sorry......
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Though getting everything ready made me even later... 
<story>I'm sorry......

data.text:
So with that, we were about to accept the drinks Doto brought 
for us, but――
data.processed:
<story>So with that, we were about to accept the drinks Doto brought 
<story>for us, but――

data.text:
This... 
This isn't hot coffee, it's hot soy sauce!
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed:
<story>This... 
<story>This isn't hot coffee, it's hot soy sauce!

data.text: S-S-Soy sauce!? I- I'm so sorry! Umm, uhhhm, well, I- I also got some scented towels ready! They should smell really good――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: S-S-Soy sauce!? I- I'm so sorry! Umm, uhhhm, well, I- I also got some scented towels ready! They should smell really good――

data.text: ――!? Cough! Hggck! What a foul... stench――
data.name: T.M. Opera O
data.processed: ――!? Cough! Hggck! What a foul... stench――

data.text: Hyaaa!? Are you all right? All you all riiight, Opera O-saaaaann～～?!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Hyaaa!? Are you all right? All you all riiight, Opera O-saaaaann～～?!

data.text:
Sniff.... Sniff....! 
I can't believe... Opera O-san really fainted...
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: She wasn't seriously hurt, so don't worry.
choices.processed: <size=39>She wasn't seriously hurt, so don't worry.</size>

data.processed:
<story>Sniff.... Sniff....! 
<story>I can't believe... Opera O-san really fainted...

data.text:
But... even though I tried to do my best, I... 
I really can't do anything right... All I do is make trouble... 
Sniff...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>But... even though I tried to do my best, I... 
<story>I really can't do anything right... All I do is make trouble... 
<story>Sniff...

data.text: I really... I really am such a useless and clumsy and stupid Umamusumeeeeee!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: I really... I really am such a useless and clumsy and stupid Umamusumeeeeee!

data.text:
She must have been very motivated to take on today's practice, 
with how much preparation she did. As she ran away in tears, I 
couldn't help but go after her in concern.
data.processed:
<story>She must have been very motivated to take on today's practice, 
<story>with how much preparation she did. As she ran away in tears, I 
<story>couldn't help but go after her in concern.
